original_text: So I went to meet with Rekab's descendants. They were Jaazaniah, son of Jeremiah and grandson of Habazziniah. I also met with Jaazaniah's brothers and all his sons. Those were all the descendants of Rekab.
korean_text: 이에 내가 하바시냐의 손자요 예레미야의 아들인 야아사냐와 그의 형제와 그의 모든 아들과 모든 레갑 사람들을 데리고

sentences.original_text: So I went to meet with Rekab's descendants.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 레갭의 후손들을 만나러 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were Jaazaniah, son of Jeremiah
I also met with Jaazaniah's brothers
Those were all the descendants of Rekab.
